name: Forbidden Racing
description:
The world of Forbidden racing is waiting for you! It's a world of charged supercars, big money, and beautiful girls. A world without rules and restrictions. Show everyone who's the real street racer!

• Handy control
All you need in the race is to switch gears in time! No complex combinations or finger-breaking gestures!

• Real-time racing
Race with real rivals from all over the world!

• Huge car fleet
Street sedans, right-hand drive Japanese cars, American muscle cars, Italian supercars and much more! More than 80 cars are waiting for you on the black market!

• Flexible tuning
Customize the speed, set parameters for each transmission, do not forget to flash the ECU and you will be the fastest racer!

• Styling
Not happy with the looks of the car? Not a problem! Change wheel rims and colors, create masterpieces with vinyl stickers. Express yourself!

• Clans
Do you play with your friends? Create a clan and rank in the top! Make a statement!

• Promotion actions
Do you like freebies? You're in the right place! Regular discounts, promotions, tournaments and much more!

• Massive and active community
Which car to choose? How to customize it? Who to race with? Join the community and find the answers to these and any other questions.

Nothing could be simpler: just go to "Settings" and click "I found a bug" button. The program will send us a letter with all the details of the problem.
